mdRecord.dcterms:title: Fiduciary Accounts: Guardianship of Zachariah Curtis Burwell
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Guardianship of Zachariah Curtis Burwell Crockett Castle, Guardian until he resigned 03.14.1894 F. M. Hylton, Succeed Castle as Guardian Recorded in Ledger Book 4, Page 322, in the Floyd County Courthouse.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Court Records
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: The Circuit Court of Floyd County
Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
